column.name: pid
column.info: ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mpid
column.info: ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: tid
column.info: Track ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mtid
column.info: Track ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: otid
column.info: Track ID of the original track that generated the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: trackE
column.info: Energy of the track

column.name: totEdep
column.info: Total Energy Deposited

column.name: avgX
column.info: Average X position in global reference system

column.name: avgY
column.info: Average Y position in global reference system

column.name: avgZ
column.info: Average Z position in global reference system

column.name: avgLx
column.info: Average X position in local reference system

column.name: avgLy
column.info: Average Y position in local reference system

column.name: avgLz
column.info: Average Z position in local reference system

column.name: px
column.info: x component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: py
column.info: y component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: pz
column.info: z component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vx
column.info: x component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vy
column.info: y component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vz
column.info: z component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvx
column.info: x component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvy
column.info: y component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvz
column.info: z component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: avgT
column.info: Average time

column.name: nsteps
column.info: Number of geant4 steps

column.name: procID
column.info: Process that created the FP. see gemc.jlab.org

column.name: hitn
column.info: Hit1 Number

column.name: sector
column.info: sector number

column.name: half
column.info: half of the sector

column.name: nphe
column.info: number of photoelectrons

column.name: time
column.info: time of hit

column.name: hitn
column.info: number of hits

column.name: nhits
column.info: number of hits in the cluster

column.name: nphe
column.info: number of hpotoelectrons

column.name: mintheta
column.info: minimum theta angle

column.name: maxtheta
column.info: maximum theta angle

column.name: minphi
column.info: minimum phi angle

column.name: maxphi
column.info: maximum phi angle

column.name: time
column.info: cluster time

column.name: theta
column.info: theta angle

column.name: dtheta
column.info: error on theta angle

column.name: phi
column.info: phi angle

column.name: dphi
column.info: error on phi angle

column.name: x
column.info: x on the surface of the mirror

column.name: y
column.info: y on the surface of the mirror

column.name: z
column.info: z on the surface of the mirror
